posts.post_content:
I am going to the east coast national Friday to sell my collection of T205, I have all the HOF's from the set minus the Griffith and Speaker, you can view the cards in my registry

  [url]http://www.sgccardregistry.com/set.aspx?cat=1&set=1027&userset=7643[/url]

My price is $2650 delivered anywhere in the U.S and Canada with tracking and signature. I have scans of all the cards back and front, if you want additional scans PM me.
Sold, I have a buyer at the National
